13  package net.sf.oval.test.validator;
14  
15  import java.util.List;
16  
17  import junit.framework.TestCase;
18  import net.sf.oval.ConstraintViolation;
19  import net.sf.oval.Validator;
20  import net.sf.oval.constraint.Assert;
21  
22  /**
23   * @author Sebastian Thomschke
24   */
25  public class AssertMVELTest extends TestCase
26  {
27  	@net.sf.oval.constraint.Assert(expr = "_this.firstName!=null && _this.lastName!=null && (_this.firstName.length() + _this.lastName.length() > 9)", lang = "mvel", message = "C0")
28  	public static class Person
29  	{
30  		@Assert(expr = "_value!=null", lang = "mvel", message = "C1")
31  		public String firstName;
32  
33  		@Assert(expr = "_value!=null", lang = "mvel", message = "C2")
34  		public String lastName;
35  
36  		@Assert(expr = "_value!=null && _value.length()>0 && _value.length()<7", lang = "mvel", message = "C3")
37  		public String zipCode;
38  	}
39  
40  	public void testMVELExpression()
41  	{
42  		final Validator validator = new Validator();
43  
44  		// test not null
45  		final Person p = new Person();
46  		List<ConstraintViolation> violations = validator.validate(p);
47  		assertEquals(4, violations.size());
48  
49  		// test max length
50  		p.firstName = "Mike";
51  		p.lastName = "Mahoney";
52  		p.zipCode = "1234567"; // too long
53  		violations = validator.validate(p);
54  		assertEquals(1, violations.size());
55  		assertEquals("C3", violations.get(0).getMessage());
56  
57  		// test not empty
58  		p.zipCode = "";
59  		violations = validator.validate(p);
60  		assertEquals(1, violations.size());
61  		assertEquals("C3", violations.get(0).getMessage());
62  
63  		// test ok
64  		p.zipCode = "wqeew";
65  		violations = validator.validate(p);
66  		assertEquals(0, violations.size());
67  
68  		// test object-level constraint
69  		p.firstName = "12345";
70  		p.lastName = "1234";
71  		violations = validator.validate(p);
72  		assertEquals(1, violations.size());
73  		assertEquals("C0", violations.get(0).getMessage());
74  	}
75  }
This page was automatically generated by Maven
